name: Vanilla Rose Custard
description: This is a custard that doesn't need a long steep but still very delicious!  Infused with vanilla and a light rose essence.  This only needs to rest about a day.  it looks like it wouldn't work but it's very delicious custard with light vanilla candied rose.  It can be an ADV for sure.  if you mix it let me know your thoughts 😊😊😎
author: Jazzy_girl

reviews.text: Delicious simple recipe, just four ingredients, and exactly as advertised. A vanilla custard with a light vanilla candied rose. The Marshmallow Vanilla and/or Vanilla Bean really candies those edible rose petals and even at 3% the Rose Essence doesn’t become too intrusive or any sort of perfumy, it just makes it interesting so it’s not just a vanilla custard. I put this one really high on my list because I love these simple recipes that are simply good. It’s no wonder FLV put this in their recipe book. Definitely one I’d mix again, it’s just a lovely dessert with a gentle floral appeal throughout.
